## BatchOperationStatus type

Contains information about performing batch operation on concrete subject.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type BatchOperationStatus = {
    $type?: string;
    Id?: number;
    CreatedItems?: Array<string>;
    ErrorCode?: string;
    Information?: string;
    State?: BatchOperationState;
    SubjectId?: string;
    ValidationErrors?: Array<ValidationError>;
    ValidationWarnings?: Array<ValidationWarning>;
};
```
